1.doc: Image may support various styles. At least url("...") and linear-gradient(<colorA>,<colorB>...) must be supported. Other variants are implementation dependent. This translates to background-image property in CSS
1.name: Image

4.doc: Repeat is a tiling mechanics and at least "repeat" and "" for no-repeat must be supported.
4.name: Repeat

5.doc: Size must support at least "contain" and "cover".
5.name: Size
